Author: vices666777
Text: ugh it pains me to read posts like these because I hate hearing others have the same anxieties around food that prevent us from enjoying things like a vacation. been living with this for years so I obviously understand nothing anyone says will actually change what you do lol, but I'll say it anyway just to put it into the void: enjoy your vacation and worry about your weight later. nothing terrible is going to happen from taking a few days off.
